9.title: Grace Shannon, Shannon Lore-Cote, Libby and Comedian Lauren Watson

episode of.title: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: From the Santa Barbara Bird Sanctuary, Grace Shannon along with owner of "Hello Gorgeous Models" Shannon Lore-Cote and Cover girl/model Libby. Then comedian Lauren Watson joins Ben. Also 3rd episode of Pine Valley Medical.

2.title: Ben welcomes Alastair Greene

episode of.title: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Ben welcomes lead guitarist from the Alan Parsons Project Mr. Alastair Greene. Also debuting his new solo CD, "Trouble at your Door."

3.title: Guest Jenny Schatzle

episode of.title: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Ben and Dominique welcome Santa Barbara's very own "fitness expert" Jenny Schatzle to the show.

4.title: Ben welcomes Ivy Vahanian and Peter Frisch

episode of.title: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Ben and Dominique get a visit from Donald Trump (Lauren Watson) Dominique's last show before taking a break to get her masters degree from USC then Actress Ivy Vahanian and director Peter Frisch join Ben.

9.title: Please Welcome Janelle Odair

episode of.title: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Special co host actress Amber Shannon helps Ben welcome stage and screen star Janelle Odair to the show.

imdb.title: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson
akas: The Evening Show with Ben Fergson (United States)
plot: Santa Barbara's very own local talk show. Ben Ferguson hosts one of the most genuine and entertaining shows around. From local celebrities to local dignitaries. Fun to be had by all. Weeknights on TVSB. Ch17
